backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining storage, access control, user data, posts, ribbits, ponds, tags, likes, and activity-tracking types and state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature changes to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the root div and bootstraps the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, and all application routes including tags, ponds, lilies, and settings.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark button that toggles bookmark state for a lily using useBookmarks and updates UI based on state.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Empty placeholder file for a comment item component.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Empty placeholder file for an emoji reactions component.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution, using a border-top design and caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Opaque global header with search, navigation links, mobile menu, and user avatar handling.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout managing header, footer, main content, and mobile left sidebar drawer with auto-close on navigation.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar navigation component with route-aware active states and recent activity list rendering.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a lily post with metadata, image handling, avatar selection, like/share actions, and counts.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the LeftSidebar with body scroll lock and animated overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing pond banner, profile image, description, and feed/about tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a ribbit (comment) with nesting, avatar, likes, timestamp, and reply form handling.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Sidebar component showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using query data and memoized sorting.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar for tag hub displaying top, trending, and newest tags via reusable modules and tag stats queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Hook managing bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and add/remove/toggle utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with helpers for login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, tags, profiles, and related backend data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Utility formatting large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Provides a shareLily function that uses Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copying with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, and Froggy Phrase security with localStorage, including backup and restore logic.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking in localStorage with helpers to check, record, and clear cooldowns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with loading states, join indicators, and links to individual pond pages.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a new lily with support for text, images, links, pond selection, tags, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a pond with fields, Froggy Phrase validation, image uploads, previews, and submit handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed of lilies with search, sorting, and sidebars, fetching and rendering lily cards or skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with image, likes, ribbits, view count logic, and actions like replying, liking, and sharing.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Renders detailed pond info including moderators, visibility, creation date, and leave‑pond controls.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed, showing its lilies, join controls, and sidebars, with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies, loading each individually and allowing removal of unavailable items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with tabbed navigation and tag statistics, plus sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Renders a tag detail page that loads canonicalized tag data, fetches lilies by tag with sorting, and displays them with sidebars and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Implements a comprehensive user settings interface with username management, avatar upload, Froggy Phrase handling, profile editing, pond membership actions, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom theme colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, versioning, and detailed feature catalog for the ribbit platform, including frontend/back-end functionality descriptions.
